events.title: The Noname Live in Shanghai
events.details: The Noname brings their iconic punk rock energy to Shanghai for an unforgettable night of raw power and anthemic choruses.

events.title: Punk Heart Festival 2026
events.details: Annual punk rock festival featuring top bands from across Asia. Three stages, non-stop music.

events.details: Showcasing the best new talent from XRE Booking roster. Don't miss these rising stars!
